name: Elemental Magic
description:
This is a game for DBRGameJam3. 

It's a metroidvania plataformer that you use the four elements as your power. In the game you play as  Aigam , the last mage. That is trying  to defeat the dark mage. Will you defeat him?

The theme was: Magic. With the limit of four buttons. 

Controls:

Arrow Keys(Left and Right) - Move;

Space - Jumps;

Z - Attack, Confirm;
